Sentencas: La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.97V0.03O3-delta (LSC) is commonly studied as a ceramic interconnect material as well as a coating material for metallic interconnects for solid oxide fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Preparation of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.97V0.03O3-δ films for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: However, it is difficult to sinter this type of material to high density.
Titulo: Preparation of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.97V0.03O3-δ films for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: In order to overcome this problem and to study the material in form of a thin film we have used Pulsed Laser Deposition to obtain a dense, uniform film with the right stochiometry.
Titulo: Preparation of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.97V0.03O3-δ films for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: Investigation of preparation-parameter dependence of the LSC films deposited on a stainless steel substrate during pulsed-laser deposition was carried out.
Titulo: Preparation of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.97V0.03O3-δ films for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The LSC films were deposited with KrF excimer laser (248 nm) on a stainless steel substrate at different oxygen pressure and substrate temperatures.
Titulo: Preparation of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.97V0.03O3-δ films for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The substrate temperature (873-1073 K) and the oxygen background pressure (5-20 Pa) were varied in order to obtain optimal growth conditions.
Titulo: Preparation of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.97V0.03O3-δ films for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The surface morphology and structural information of the films were obtained using scanning electron microscope (SEM) and X-ray diffraction, respectively.
Titulo: Preparation of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.97V0.03O3-δ films for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: Under the optimal preparation-parameter conditions: substrate temperature of 1023 K and an oxygen pressure of 10 Pa the structure of the film agreed with the target structure and the SEM micrographs show that the surfaces are homogeneous, smooth, crack-free and dense.
Titulo: Preparation of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.97V0.03O3-δ films for solid oxide fuel cell application
Preparation of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.97V0.03O3-δ films for solid oxide fuel cell application
Preparation of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.97V0.03O3-δ films for solid oxide fuel cell application
